wikipedia_page.main:
Christopher Frederick Sains (born 3 August 1978) is an English cricketer.  Sains is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm fast-medium.  He was born in Romford, London.
Sains represented the Essex Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Lancashire Cricket Board in the 2000 NatWest Trophy.  In his only List A match, he scored an unbeaten 2 runs.He currently plays club cricket for Hornchurch Cricket Club.
